comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Oh,  the JCR jars were uploaded in the Maven repository at ibiblio. Cool!

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Fixed for jackrabbit-core and jackrabbit-jcr-rmi in revisions 446868 and 446869.

Thanks for reporting this!

description:
Change the following dependency in pom.xml to match what is really available at the maven repos:
FROM:
    <dependency>
      <groupId>jsr170</groupId>
      <artifactId>jcr</artifactId>
      <version>1.0</version>
    </dependency>


TO:
    <dependency>
      <groupId>javax.jcr</groupId>
      <artifactId>jcr</artifactId>
      <version>1.0</version>
    </dependency>
summary: Fix pom.xml in jackrabbit core (small fix, big return)
